group_1.textLeft: You're...rethinking it...?
What, when I was just about to@come to terms with it?!

group_1.textRight: Well, it'd be troublesome if a situation@like this came up again, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, I was just thinking about that too.
We have to consider that we're@not getting any younger.
I don't want to make any more trouble@for Kokoro than we already have...
I'm thinking that even if we do live separately,@I'd still want to be somewhere close by.
That way if anything happens to one of us,@we'd be right there.

group_1.textRight: Something like neighboring apartments...perhaps@different floors in the same building?

group_1.textLeft: That's a good idea.

group_1.textRight: Then whenever Kokoro comes home to visit,@we'll just all gather up in one place...

group_1.textLeft: Heh... Hahaha, what is this...?!
Aaah, geeze, and I was so prepared@for a letdown, too.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@Sorry about that.

group_1.textLeft: Not at all.@*Chuckle*

group_1.textCenter: (Happiness comes in many different@forms...and it can even change shape.)
(Even when it contradicts itself,@it takes the form that's best for people.)
(...Then if there really are many forms of happiness,)
(I wonder if my form of happiness@will change someday as well...)

group_1.textLeft: Hey, both of you.

group_1.textCenter: Hmm?

group_1.textLeft: I, uh...was asked to be a model for wedding photos...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:800700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?! A wedding?!

group_1.textRight: I see, you and Masara together.

group_1.textLeft: And so I need to get parental consent for it...

group_1.textRight: I don't see any reason for us to object.
...Kokoro in a dress, hmm.@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:800600:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]*Giggle* That might be nice.
Don't you think so too?
Eh, ah, ahem...@Well, she's not REALLY getting married...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks!
Also, just for reference, can you tell me what@it was like when you two got married?
Or is that no good...?

group_1.textRight: No...it's not that, it's just...@It's a bit embarrassing.
Your father was very shy back when we first met.
But even so, you still fell in love with me at first@sight and confessed right there, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: ...Uh, back then, well, I was young...

group_1.textRight: Our proposal was by the sea.@He was all dressed up, you know.
We were still students, but he@brought me a bouquet of roses,
and said "Please marry me!"

group_1.textLeft: Stop teasing me...
What's with the sudden bouquet of roses...?

group_1.textRight: ...@[wait:0.8][chara:800500:lipSynch_1]...P-please...marry m-me...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@I didn't know anyone could blush that much.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]D-don't tease me...@So, what's your answer...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes.@Please took good care of me.

group_1.textCenter: (...That vision I saw just now...it seemed like...)
(Did I catch Aimi's delusions?@...Maybe something like that.)
(But, I see...)
(Mom and Dad used to be a young couple too.)
(Now their relationship is different, but there@was a time when they were all lovey-dovey.)
(For me, they've always just been my parents.)
(But there was a time when they were together,@a time I didn't know about.)
(I never really thought about that until now...)

group_1.textRight: The day you found out we were having Kokoro,@you started crying, remember?

group_1.textLeft: ...I couldn't help myself, I was just so happy.

group_1.textCenter: (That's right... They didn't start off as parents.)
(They were a couple that got married, and then@they became parents when I was born...)
(...They really did love each other.)
(Time has passed, their relationship changed,@and their happiness changed shape with it.)
(And I...I was born of love and desire.)
(If they've been together for me this whole time...)
(If I tied them together with my wish...)
(From now on, I'll be the one@to support their happiness.)

group_1.textLeft: Hold up, it looks like Kokoro has frozen up.@Hey, cut it out...

group_1.textRight: [chara:800600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: It must be gross hearing about@how your parents met, right...?
No! I want to hear even more!

group_1.textRight: Give me a break...

group_1.textLeft: (Maybe one day I'll start a family of my own.)
(But, whatever happiness I find at that time is fine,)
(because happiness doesn't have a fixed shape.)

group_1.textRight: Oh I remember, your father got@the size for my ring wrong...
[chara:800700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Shh! That was supposed to be a secret...!

group_1.textLeft: *Laugh* Dad, you sure were clumsy.
